text: Sándor Tóth (18 August 1939 – 11 September 2019) was a Hungarian poet and journalist. He was a member of the Christian Democratic People's Party (KDNP). He was a Member of Parliament (MP) for Pásztó (Nógrád County Constituency II) between 1990 and 1994. ==References== Category:1939 births Category:2019 deaths Category:Hungarian politicians Category:Hungarian poets Category:Hungarian journalists
title: Sándor Tóth
